availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Benjamin F. Humphrey (Harrison County, Kentucky, farmhand)

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, farm laborer. Kentucky native. Son of Jameson Humphreys and Elizabeth Humphreys. Resident of Harrison County in 1850. Farm laborer in Harrison County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 2, p. 119B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 2, p. 468.
"Benjamin F. Humphrey (1840-1908)," Find A Grave, Memorial #137419160, accessed June 16, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/137419160.
